# nostr-core

> Dead-simple, vendor-neutral NWC (Nostr Wallet Connect) client library for JavaScript/TypeScript. Control any Lightning wallet programmatically via NIP-47.

nostr-core lets agents and applications pay invoices, check balances, create invoices, and listen for payments through any NWC-compatible Lightning wallet. One connection string, zero framework dependencies, auto-encryption. Works in Node.js 18+, Deno, Bun, and Cloudflare Workers. Free and open source (MIT).

- [NWC](api/nwc.md): Main NWC client class - constructor, wallet methods, notifications, event emitter

- [Types](api/types.md): All TypeScript types - Transaction, requests, responses, notifications, FiatRate, FiatConversion

- [Relay](api/relay.md): Single relay WebSocket connection and subscriptions

- [Filter](api/filter.md): Event filtering types and match functions
- [NIP-04](api/nip04.md): AES-256-CBC encryption (legacy)
- [NIP-44](api/nip44.md): ChaCha20 authenticated encryption (recommended)
- [NIP-19](api/nip19.md): Bech32 encoding/decoding (npub, nsec, note, nprofile, nevent, naddr)
- [Utils](api/utils.md): normalizeURL, bytesToHex, hexToBytes, randomBytes
